title: The Lunchbox
writer: Ritesh Batra (screenplay), Vasan Bala (hindi dialogue consultant)
actors: Irrfan Khan, Nimrat Kaur, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Lillete Dubey
plot: The film, set in Mumbai, revolves around a mistaken delivery by the Dabbawalas (lunchbox service) of Mumbai, which leads to a relationship between Saajan, a lonely widower close to retirement, and Ila, an unhappy housewife, as they start exchanging notes through the daily lunchbox.
awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 28 wins & 35 nominations.
